mapper.select:
select
from Suspende su where su.Suspende_Id = #{suspendeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and su.TimeLiness=0

select ,,, from Suspende su inner join Student stu on su.Student_Id=stu.Student_Id inner join Classes cl on su.Classes_Id=cl.Classes_Id inner join Course c on su.Course_Id=c.Course_Id where su.TimeLiness=0
